_sText:
A Surf-Infamous community made map (see: surf_ forbidden_ tomb). The map was made as an appreciative thankyou to the community leader (Spliff) for his dedication over the years at keeping it going strong. Release thread: http://www.surf-infamous.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=24&t=10562 Development thread (yes, this was started about a year ago): http://www.surf-infamous.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=25&t=7411 Alternative Download: http://fastdl.surf-infamous.com/cstrike/maps/surf_ loves_ spliff.bsp.bz2 (Remove the spaces) Spawn - Frank
Stage 1 - Shift
Stage 2 - Frank
Stage 3 - Shift
Stage 4 - Frank
Stage 5 - Frank
Stage 6 - Shift
Stage 7 - Bental
Winner's Jail - Shift
Jail 1 - Bental
Jail 2 - Frank
Bonus - Shift
There is a 5 minute timer, whereupon one of two jails are chosen. One is a standard get guns according to your level and kill each other, in an albeit non-standard setting, and the other is more of a minigame style. Completing all the stages, or the bonus, sends you to a unique winners jail. Have fun with that. Beta footage (all the levels are roughly the same): Surf timer server owners can remove the timers by killing the logic_ timer and level_ teleport (remove the spaces)
